text: (upbeat music)
- Hi, I'm Chris O'Brien,
and I lead product marketing at Devo.
Devo is a cloud native logging

and security analytics platform
that enables our customers

to confidently defend their
organization from cyber threats.
Our goal at our inception
was to be the next generation
logging and security analytics solution.

And to do this, we
needed to be cloud based.
We needed to be SaaS.
And this was important

because our solution needed
to be super easy to procure
and used by our customers
while also being really powerful,

scaling to meet rapidly
growing data requirements
well beyond what was previously possible,
and to do so elastically.
AWS excelled at making this
and much more possible for Devo.

10 years ago, security solutions
were mostly on premises.
they required constant care and tuning,
and they didn't scale well,

which resulted in security
teams being ill prepared

to detect and investigate
advanced cyber threats.

For example, legacy solutions
commonly only provided 30 days
of historical data for investigations.

Devo, by contrast, provides
400 days of always hot data.

And this greatly improves
the visibility and confidence

that our customers need to
defend against cyber threats.
Also as part of our mission to greatly

improve the security efficacy
of organizations globally,

we needed a partner who
could make the delivery

of the Devo platform as
SaaS a technical reality.
And AWS was the only cloud provider

that we could partner with
to make this a reality.

AWS has made it possible
to deliver what used

to be a very complex
technology solution as SaaS,
significantly improving the value
we could deliver to our customers,

especially when compared
to legacy solutions.
AWS not only makes Devo possible
from a technology standpoint,
they also make it push button easy

for our customers to procure
via the AWS Marketplace.

AWS has supported our go-to
market expansion globally.

We've gone from operating
in a single region in Europe

to being able to deliver the
Devo platform across the globe.
AWS has also enabled us

to deliver innovations
quickly to our customers,
enabling us to be a true ally for them

in their mission to defend
their organizations.

Our platform's innovative
architecture is made possible

thanks to the underlying
AWS infrastructure,

which enables us to deliver
a low TCO, highly scalable,

real-time security analytics
platform for our customers.
The Devo platform available via AWS

enables our customers to
defend their organization
from cyber threats in ways
that previously were not possible.
In today's world,

our customers need to be
able and use their data

to their advantage, enabling
them to find the hidden signals

across a vast amount of data
and take decisive action.

To do this, Devo allows our
customers to detect threats
and get answers to their questions
in as close to real time as possible.

The fact that we can do
this with the simplicity

of SaaS is incredibly
valuable to our customers.
(upbeat music)
